CustomField.description: Defines the Invoice Contact that will be detailed on invoices when the Invoice Group By of "Client", "Hiring Manager (Invoice Client)", "PO Number" and "Invoice To Account" are used. The Invoice Group By of "Assignment" and "Invoice To Contact" will use the Invoice To Contact detailed on the Assignment. Invoice Group By of "Hiring Manager (Invoice Hiring Manager)" will use the Hiring Manager detailed on the Assignment
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines the Invoice Contact that will be detailed on invoices when the Invoice Group By of "Client", "Hiring Manager (Invoice Client)", "PO Number" and "Invoice To Account" are used.
CustomField.label: Invoice Contact
CustomField.relationshipLabel: Accounts with Contact as Invoice Contact
